name: Nice Isles
description:
NICE ISLES is a chill simulator of a lone isle and its human inhabitant under various weather conditions, all procedurally generated!

BEST USED FOR:

  • character design;
  • relaxation and self-care;
  • countering loneliness;
  • getting into a cozy mood;
  • food-time entertainment;
  • making pixel avatars for friends and yourself!
